scripts.precommit: npm --prefix frontend run lint-staged && uv run pre-commit run
scripts.reset-database: cd backend && uv run scripts/setup_db.py --reset && uv run manage.py makemigrations && uv run manage.py migrate
scripts.import-dummy-data: cd backend && uv run manage.py loaddata portal/fixtures/realistic_dummy_data.json && mkdir -p build/ && cp -r portal/fixtures/media build/
scripts.check-lint: cd frontend && npx eslint . --ext ts --ext tsx --ext js --max-warnings 0
scripts.check-frontend: npm run check-format && npm run check-lint && npm run check-types
scripts.check-backend: uv run black --check --diff --color backend/ && uv run flake8 --show-source backend/
scripts.check-all: npm run check-frontend && npm run check-backend && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.check-format-all: npm run check-format && npm run check-lint && npm run check-types && npm run format-prettier && npm run format-python && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.test-backend: cd backend && uv run manage.py test
scripts.test-all: npm run test-frontend && npm run test-backend
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && uv run manage.py runserver
